desc: The SBT (Soulbound Token) badge you receive through the challenge is stored permanently on the blockchain and cannot be transferred or sold. It is a proof of your technical ability and adds value to your resume.

tip.step1: Navigate to the Tweet you’d like the URL of.
tip.step3: From the pop-up menu, select Copy link to Tweet. The URL should now be copied to your clipboard.

share.title: I completed a challenge on {{what}} and earned an on-chain competency Certification badge.
